text.content:
sequenceDiagram
    participant ISS as 💳 Issuer
    participant CN as 🌐 Network
    participant LOG as 📜 Logger
    participant NOTI as 📢 Notification
    participant P as 👤 Payer

    note over ISS,CN: ⏳ Authorization not captured before expiry
    ISS->>ISS: Release held funds
    ISS->>LOG: Log expiry event
    LOG->>NOTI: Trigger expiry notification
    NOTI-->>P: Funds released (Authorization Expired)
